creator: Servidor Dev
descriptionHtml:
Do you want a notebook to note down your day-to-day tasks? Want to write notes and make a to-do list to manage daily tasks?

Notepad+ is a customizable note book. To-Do-List is specially designed to manage daily tasks easily. Write note easily and effortlessly than any other note-taking app. Easy is an easy-to-use notepad. Note pad app allows its users to take notes on colorful backgrounds and checklists to organize notes and tasks easily. Add photos or audio to the notes and set the reminder. Notepad free is a good note taking app for keeping notes and organizing tasks.
Good Notes free is a completely offline app. Login is provided for the facility of the user. If the user changes the mobile, he will not lose the data that he had saved in the notebook.
Notebook – Writing Pad Features
- Take Important Notes
- Make Check List (To-Do List)
- Add Reminders
- Search your Notes Easily
- Completely Offline
- Simple, Safe, and Completely Customizable
- Import Images from Gallery and Attach Photos and Images
- Multi Color Notes
- Take Audio Notes
- Control Font Style and Size
- Draw and Paint on Notepad
- Easily Share via E-mail and Social Apps
- Print and Export into PDF files
Easy Notes app has no limit to adding text, pictures, or anything else that users want to save as notes. Copy-paste any type of links and text directly to your preferred notes. Notepad is a very important tool to save links and data. Note taking app has been designed like a real notebook to make it easy to note all thoughts, ideas, schedules, information, and password.
To-do list, schedule planner, and shopping list are free tools in Note Book. Rearrange the task list and mark them completed on achievement. Checklist mode allows its users to add multiple tasks. On the completion of the task, check or uncheck each line on the list with a quick tap.
Reminder is provided to manage the to-do list, checklist, and important notes with the task tracker. Reminder for Notebook Free allows its users to set reminders for simple notes. Manage tasks, birthdays, appointments, bill pay, and medicines as per schedule.
Notepad is a remarkable app for making your customizable sticky notes and set font style and color. Users can make notes more attractive by bolding them in italic and underlining them. Users can add text, and select font styles.
Notepad free offers a voice notepad feature to its users. Record audio, lecture, or conference call notes, meetings and save them as voice notes anywhere at any time.
descriptionShort: Capture Secret Notes, To-Do List, Color Notes, Voice Notes all in one Notepad
title: Notepad – Keep Notes
